title: The Manton plan
creator_credit: Tasmanian Film Corporation, Don Anderson and Sherry James
brief_description: Shows how a local municipality goes about establishing a “Disaster Plan”, and putting the plan into operation when a bus crashes on the outskirts of the town and all services are brought into action.
creator_credit_for_label: Tasmanian Film Corporation, Don Anderson and Sherry James
description: Shows how a local municipality goes about establishing a “Disaster Plan”, and putting the plan into operation when a bus crashes on the outskirts of the town and all services are brought into action.
